cabra.dinero
Class VaultManager

java.lang.Object
  cabra.dinero.VaultManager

public class VaultManager
extends java.lang.Object

Controller class for the Vault. It receives input from the view (purchasePrize()), changes the model, and updates the view. Most-commonly-used public methods: int getPoints() boolean purchasePrize()

Constructor Summary
VaultManager(PointManager pointManager, GUI gui, javax.swing.JLabel pointLabel)
          Usage: Create a VaultManager when you want to start up the vault.

getFrame

public javax.swing.JFrame getFrame()
Returns the frame this is contained in.

the frame that the vault stuff is in.

getPoints

public int getPoints()

update

public void update()
Updates based on how many points the user has.

updatePointLabel

public void updatePointLabel(int points)
Refreshes the points label so it reflects the number of points the user has.

Parameters:
points - how many points the user has.

purchasePrizePack

public boolean purchasePrizePack(PrizePack pack)
Purchases the prize pack. The user's points are decreased by the pack's cost, and the prizes contained in the pack is added to the list of purchased prizes.

Parameters:
prize - the prize pack to purchase
Returns:
true if the user can afford the prize pack (and bought it), false if ther user can't afford it

canUserAfford

public boolean canUserAfford(PrizePack pack)
Convenience method. Returns true if the user can afford the given prize pack (has enough points), false otherwise.

getPurchaseablePrizes

public java.util.ArrayList<Prize> getPurchaseablePrizes()
Returns a list of all prizes that have NOT been purchased. They may or may not be affordable.

getPurchasedPrizes

public java.util.ArrayList<Prize> getPurchasedPrizes()
Returns a list of all prizes that the user has bought. These are, therefore, not available for purchase.
